title: vívosmart 3: The Subtle, Stylish, Smart Activity Tracker
description:
Your activity tracker doesn’t define you, but what you do with it certainly can. vívosmart 3 features a hidden display and is packed with smart features and new fitness and wellness monitoring tools.

Sleek, form-fitting activity tracker with a hidden display and fitness monitoring capabilities
24/7 heart rate monitoring with Elevate™ wrist heart rate technology
Features up to 5 days of battery life2
Tracks steps, floors climbed, calories burned, intensity minutes, sleep and more1
Safe for swimming and showering3

1 See Garmin.com/ataccuracy
2 Battery life may vary depending on usage
3 See Garmin.com/waterrating
